name: Titanium Casing
description:
TITANIUM CASING

Take control of a robotic rookie robber on your first outing to case the Museum of Future Human History, and steal as much as you can! Stay stealthy, avoid robots and cameras, plan your snatch-and-grab route, and get away with the goods!

Created in 16 hours for Miziziziz's Four Devs One Art Kit Series

Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift - Sprint

LMB (Held) - Analyze Valuables

RMB - Throw Whizbang

E - Steal Object

Tab - Close Dialogue
